properties.directives:
#pragma load-directives parse-as-csv-multi;
parse-as-csv-multi :body '|;|' true
drop :body
filter-rows-on condition-true offset == 0
drop offset

properties.selectedFields: DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.ACCT_NUM as ACCT_NUM,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.ACCT_NUM_EXT as ACCT_NUM_EXT,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.ACCT_NUM_ORIG as ACCT_NUM_ORIG,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.SOURCE_SYS as SOURCE_SYS,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE as ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.DUNNING_CATEGORY as DUNNING_CATEGORY,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.PAYMENT_METHOD as PAYMENT_METHOD,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.AR_STATUS as AR_STATUS,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.FISCAL_NO as FISCAL_NO,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.BILL_CYCLE as BILL_CYCLE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.AR_IND as AR_IND,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.BILL_TYPE as BILL_TYPE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.VPN_ID as VPN_ID,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.VPN_USR_GROUP as VPN_USR_GROUP,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.TAX_RATE as TAX_RATE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.CONSOLIDATION_IND as CONSOLIDATION_IND,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.NUM_OF_CHILD_ACCOUNTS as NUM_OF_CHILD_ACCOUNTS,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.TF_EXTRACT_DATE as CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.ACCT_CAT_VAL as ACCT_CAT_VAL,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.NEXT_BILL_DATE as NEXT_BILL_DATE,DQ_Parse_CUSTOMER_ACCOUNT.FileName as CA_FileName,DQ_Parse_CUST_SIEBEL.X_VGE_ACCNT_FLG as X_VGE_ACCNT_FLG,DQ_Parse_CUST_SIEBEL.ACCT_TYPE as ACCT_TYPE,DQ_Parse_CUST_SIEBEL.X_VDF_IDENTIFIED_ACCOUNT as X_VDF_IDENTIFIED_ACCOUNT,DQ_Parse_CUST_SIEBEL.CUST_STAT_CD as CUST_STAT_CD,DQ_Parse_CUST_SIEBEL.CLIENT_ROW_ID as CLIENT_ROW_ID

Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCT_NUM as ACCT_NUM,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCT_NUM_EXT as ACCT_NUM_EXT,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCT_NUM_ORIG as ACCT_NUM_ORIG,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.SOURCE_SYS as SOURCE_SYS,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE as ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.DUNNING_CATEGORY as DUNNING_CATEGORY,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.PAYMENT_METHOD as PAYMENT_METHOD,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.AR_STATUS as AR_STATUS,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.FISCAL_NO as FISCAL_NO,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.BILL_CYCLE as BILL_CYCLE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.AR_IND as AR_IND,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.BILL_TYPE as BILL_TYPE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.VPN_ID as VPN_ID,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.VPN_USR_GROUP as VPN_USR_GROUP,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.CONSOLIDATION_IND as CONSOLIDATION_IND,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.NUM_OF_CHILD_ACCOUNTS as NUM_OF_CHILD_ACCOUNTS,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE as CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCT_CAT_VAL as ACCT_CAT_VAL,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.NEXT_BILL_DATE as NEXT_BILL_DATE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.CA_FileName as CA_FileName,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.X_VGE_ACCNT_FLG as X_VGE_ACCNT_FLG,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.ACCT_TYPE as ACCT_TYPE,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.X_VDF_IDENTIFIED_ACCOUNT as X_VDF_IDENTIFIED_ACCOUNT,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.CUST_STAT_CD as CUST_STAT_CD,Joiner_CustAcc_CustSiebel.CLIENT_ROW_ID as CS_CLIENT_ROW_ID,DQ_ParseFile_NIF_Master.CLIENT_ROW_ID as NIF_CLIENT_ROW_ID

properties.directives:
set-column billingAccount_alternativeCustomerPartyId NIF_CLIENT_ROW_ID
set-column billingAccount_alternativeOriginalCustomerPartyId NIF_CLIENT_ROW_ID
set-column BillingAccount_attr7 X_VGE_ACCNT_FLG 
set-column BillingAccount_attr6 ACCT_TYPE 
set-column CustomerAccount_taxIdentificationNumberValid X_VDF_IDENTIFIED_ACCOUNT 
set-column BillingAccount_attr8 CUST_STAT_CD 
set-column BillingAccount_customerPartyId CS_CLIENT_ROW_ID
set-column BillingAccount_originalCustomerPartyId CS_CLIENT_ROW_ID
set-column billingAccount_Id ACCT_NUM
set-column BillingAccount_originalBillingAccountId ACCT_NUM_ORIG
set-column BillingAccount_integrationBillingAccountId ACCT_NUM_EXT
set-column empty_bd empty(ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE) ? '19000101' : ACCOUNT_ORIGINATION_DATE

parse-as-date empty_bd ['date']
set-column empty_bd_1 empty_bd_1.toLocalDate()
set-column billingAccount_creationDate empty_bd_1
set-column billingAccount_creationDate empty_bd == '19000101' ? null : billingAccount_creationDate
drop empty_bd,empty_bd_1,empty_bd_1

set-column billingAccount_customerCreditRatingCd DUNNING_CATEGORY
set-column PaymentMethod_id PAYMENT_METHOD
set-column collection_Status AR_STATUS
set-column CustomerAccount_taxIdentificationNumber FISCAL_NO
set-column CycleSpecification_Id BILL_CYCLE
set-column billingAccount_billResponsability AR_IND
set-column billingAccount_billFormatCd BILL_TYPE
set-column BillingAccount_attr4 VPN_ID
set-column BillingAccount_attr5 VPN_USR_GROUP

trim SOURCE_SYS
set-column BillingAccount_TaxRate SOURCE_SYS == 'ARBOR' ? '23EXC' : SOURCE_SYS
set-column BillingAccount_TaxRate SOURCE_SYS == 'PPB' ? '23INC' : BillingAccount_TaxRate
set-column BillingAccount_TaxRate empty(BillingAccount_TaxRate) ? '*NA' : BillingAccount_TaxRate
set-column BillingAccount_attr2 CONSOLIDATION_IND
set-column BillingAccount_attr3 NUM_OF_CHILD_ACCOUNTS

set-type CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE string
set-column empty_extract empty(CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE) ? '19000101' : CA_TF_EXTRACT_DATE
parse-as-fixed-length empty_extract 4,2,2
merge empty_extract_1 empty_extract_2 year_month -
merge year_month empty_extract_3 year_month_day -
set-column BillingAccount_lastModifiedDate year_month_day + " 00:00:00"
parse-as-simple-date BillingAccount_lastModifiedDate yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss
set-column BillingAccount_lastModifiedDate empty_extract == '19000101' ? null : BillingAccount_lastModifiedDate
drop empty_extract,empty_extract_1,empty_extract_2

set-column BillingAccount_Category ACCT_CAT_VAL
set-column BillingAccount_attr1 NEXT_BILL_DATE
set-column BillingAccount_name '*NA'
set-column BillingAccount_attr9 '*NA'
set-column BillingAccount_attr10 '*NA'
set-column FileName CA_FileName
set-column BillingAccount_Source SOURCE_SYS

#pragma load-directives now;
now :LoadDate
set-column curr_dt LoadDate.toString()
parse-as-date :curr_dt UTC
set-column BillingAccountg_loading_dt curr_dt_1

#pragma load-directives parse-as-csv-multi;
parse-as-csv-multi :body '|;|' true
drop :body
filter-rows-on condition-true offset == 0
drop offset

#pragma load-directives parse-as-csv-multi;
parse-as-csv-multi :body '|;|' true
drop :body
filter-rows-on condition-true offset == 0
drop offset
